sentence.idiomatic: There is a row of parasol trees on the side of Heng Shang Road.
I never buy breakfast from the street.
Are there any street stalls that sell late night snacks here?
You could trade in your old mobile phone for a new one.
This job doesn’t suit me. I want to change to a new one.
He hasn’t changed his computer since I met him.
The enemy has all kinds of tricks. We have to be careful.
He doesn’t have any new tricks up his sleeves.
Does your wife cook different things for you everyday?
I want to pick some fresh fruit.
His kid didn’t choose that comic book.
Does your firm want to select some experienced staff?
He sells the most authentic lamb kebabs.
The Japanese food in this restaurant is not authentic at all.
Do you want to try the most authentic Peking duck?
I am into all things that are characteristic of China.
The clothes in this shop are not special at all.
Do customers nowadays like unique products?
Long Jing is the premium variety of green tea.
The corns that our country produces are not very popular due to a lack of good variety.
Do you need some fine quality potatoes?
There are so many kinds of street food in Shanghai. They’re both cheap and tasty. I buy my breakfast on the street every day.
That’s the truth. I like street food stalls too. What do you usually buy for breakfast?
I often change and try different things. Sometimes I eat steamed buns, sometimes I eat Chinese flat cake with deep fried dough stick. What do you like to eat?
I like buying late night snacks on the street. My favorite is hot and spicy soup. Lamb kebabs are great too.
When I was in Beijing on business, I saw a lot of stalls selling caramelized hawthorn sticks and meat-stuffed pita sandwiches.
That’s right. There is quite a difference between street foods in the North and South. But they mainly sell their local specialties.
That’s true. Food from the street is the most authentic and is also incredibly cheap. It only costs 10 yuan to eat until you’re stuffed.
Yeah. However, some of the street stalls aren't very hygienic. You have to do your best to find a clean one.
